duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepares pharmaceutical orders for patient care areas under pharmacy guidelines.
Maintains adequate stock levels and reviews medical areas for expired drugs.
Maintains refrigeration temperature logs and provides general assistance to pharmacists.
Fill medication orders accurately and retrieve/deliver medication in a timely fashion.
Prepare/check Urgent Use Stock orders and review medication areas for expired drugs.
Operate Baxa pump, defrost frozen antibiotic intravenous mini-bags, and prepare antibiotic concentrate.
Maintain a neat and hygienic area, dispose of intravenous needles/equipment, and assist in maintaining required records.
Delivery of patient IVs to nursing units and perform related duties as required.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an approved pharmacy technician training program, OR an advanced degree in Pharmacy or relevant experience. IV experience preferred.
